title: PHPdebug_zval_dump()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPdebug_zval_dump()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Example Dump a string representation of an internal zend value to output: "; ?> Definition and Usage The debug_zval_dump() function dumps a string representation of an internal zend value to output. Syntax debug_zval_dump( variable ); Parameter Values Parameter Description variable Required. Specifies the variable to be evaluated Technical Details Return Value: Nothing Return Type: - PHP Version: 4.2+ ★ +1
